author: jdcasey
msg: it0114 worked for me on the last run. Seems I had an updating issue for the bootstrap, since my M2_HOME was pointing at a linked directory, not a real one (ant's delete task doesn't like that, apparently).

author: jdcasey
msg: OPEN - issue MNG-3012: ClassCastException due to plexus-utils NOT being filtered during plugin loading
Removing some debug output that will be quite noisy...

author: jdcasey
msg: Reverting changes to IdeUtils, since the problem with ClassCastException on plugin.getConfiguration() is fixed in maven trunk.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-3012] Adding an import for Xpp3Dom from plexus-utils in maven-core to plugin realms, to prevent ClassCastException when they call plugin.getConfiguration() from maven-model objects.
